body:
Yes, we're promoting class-based layers and we will not add such function layers. Also, if it doesn't have a state (weights), then it is better for it not to be a layer at all.

Is "unpooling" as you define it the same as "repeat"? e.g.

```
A B
C D

becomes

A A B B
A A B B
C C D D
C C D D
```
